verses.roman:
mahā-prema-maya tiṅho vasilā aṅgane
sakala vaiṣṇava tāṅra vandilā caraṇe

synonyms: mahā-prema-maya—absorbed in emotional love; tiṅho—he; vasilā—sat; aṅgane—in the courtyard; sakala vaiṣṇava—all other Vaiṣṇavas; tāṅra—his; vandilā—worshiped; caraṇe—lotus feet.
translation: Absorbed in emotional love, he sat in my courtyard, and all the Vaiṣṇavas bowed down at his feet.
